name: 1-Bit Revival: The Residuals of Null
description: Four arcade games that pit the player against swarms of enemies inside a deadly matrix system that is programmed to destroy you.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 or later Processor: An Intel Pentium 4 processor or later that's SSE2 capable Memory: 2048 MB RAM Storage: 165 MB available space
